VEinterpolation

Installation

You can install the development version of {VEinterpolation} from GitHub:

devtools::install_github("Epiconcept-Paris/VEBIS_EHR_VE_impact_study_interpolation")

Demo

This package allows to interpolate weekly data from 8-week data from vaccine effectiveness (VE) data.

See the dedicated vignette for more details:

  • Interpolate Monthly Data to Weekly Data
